content: संचर् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (but <ab>Atm.</ab> when used with the instrumental of a conveyance) {@--1@} To move, walk, go, pass, walk about; यानैः समचरंतान्ये <ls>Bk. 8. 32</ls>; क्वचित्पथा संचरते सुराणां <ls>R. 13. 19</ls>; <ls>N. 6. 57.</ls> {@--2@} To practise, perform. {@--3@} To pass over, be transferred to. {@--4@} To act, behave; <ls>Māl. 6. 2.</ls> {@--5@} To join, meet. {@--6@} To pass or roam through, travel over. {@--7@} To arrive at, reach, attain. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to go about, lead, conduct; यूथानि संचार्य <ls>Ś. 5. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To cause to spread, circulate. {@--3@} To transmit, communicate, pass over, deliver over to (as a disease &c.). {@--4@} To turn out (as cattle &c.) to graze. {@--5@} To impel, instigate, incite.
